snippet: François Fillon — who was declared the loser of a leadership vote in the center-right opposition party — proposed Tuesday that a new election be held next spring in which he most likely would not run.
lead_paragraph: François Fillon — who was declared the loser of a leadership vote in the center-right opposition party — proposed Tuesday that a new election be held next spring in which he most likely would not run.

headline.seo: Declared Loser Proposes New Election Within French Party
headline.main: Declared Loser Proposes New Election Within French Party
headline.print_headline: Declared Loser Proposes New Election Within French Party
